inn1.comm: it landed on a length, on the leg and middle line, slided in to strike Tamim on the pad.
Full and outside off and Tamim, as his wont, goes for a big slash but doesn' t connect.
straighter, on a length, around the off stump and Tamim punches it on the up to cover.
landed on a length, on the middle and cut away. Tamim had it covered though and shouldered arms.
lands outside off stump, full and moves away. Again left alone.
full and on the legs, is struck on the pad as he fails to connect with his intended flick shot
another one that slants away from Tamim who lets it sail past him
further outside off stump, Tamim is not interested.
Gets it right straightaway. Full and swinging in late, in the middle and leg line, flicked to square leg.
slips it on to the the legs, swings away and Nafees glances it fine.
better. Gets it to swing in from outside the off stump but Nafees had his off stump covered and let that one alone.
on the middle and leg, on a length ,defended away
full and outside off and it moves in a touch, Nafees goes back and across and tries to punch it through the off side. Not the line nor the length for it and ends up stabbing it away to the off side
There is some swing on offer. Full and outside off, Nafees shapes to drive through off, the ball swings in, the bat-face shuts and the ball rolls over towards midwicket.
And some seam movement too. But it starts from the off stump and moves away further. Left alone.

Ah! he gets it spot on this time. On the middle , forcing Nafees to have a prod and the ball cuts past the outside edge. To his credit, Nafees didn't hang his bat out and didn't go in search of the ball.
fuller, and just outside off, Nafees lunges forward, covers the off stump and shoulders arms
way outside the off stump. Wide called.
starts from the off and moves away. Maharoof is getting movement but he has to hit the right areas.
full and outside off stump, Nafees tries to drill it through the off side but no wood on leather and he is beaten
around the off stump, dabbed to backward point
swings in a touch from outside the off stump, left alone
fuller, closer to the off stump, curves in, Tamim moves towards the line to push it to cover
similar delivery, this time driven down the track and it hits the sticks at the other end

Malinga strikes. Bangladesh lose early wicket. Again. The story of the summer. It was full and outside off and it curved in a touch. Nafees is caught at the crease, has a stab at it as he tries to run it past the slips and ends up nicking to second slip. Quite a lame poke.
nice outswinger to the right-handed Imran, left alone
lands outside the off stump and cuts away even further. Wide called.
fuller, straighter, on the middle, driven down the track, Maharoof swoops to his right, grabs the ball smartly and threatens to throw it at the stumps.
beaten. It landed on a length, on the off and middle line before angling away. Tamim goes for a drive, the bat goes inside the line of the delivery
just outside the off stump, left alone at the last minute
fullish, on the middle line, Tamim tries to drive it inside-out through cover and the ball goes past point.
back of length, on the middle, Tamim gets on top of the bounce, dabs it to short fine-leg region for a single
full and sliding on to the pads, runs off the pad to square leg

full and swinging in, on the off stump line, Tamim, who has a slightly open stance, tries to bottom-hand a drive away through covers but the bat-face again shuts a touch early and the ball runs to midwicket. Hmm....
on the middle,

Malinga snares another victim. Cleaned up. Full, swinging in late, on the middle and Tamim tries to drive, the ball curves in late to miss the bat  and the furniture is disturbed. The top order is wobbling again.
on the middle and leg, pushed to the on side
lands on a length, outside the off stump and shapes away.
on the off stump line, cuts away late and Imran is beaten as he pokes inside the line
fuller, sliding on to the middle and leg and Imran is struck on the pad. Appeal for lbw but it was going down.
lands on a length, outside the off stump and it seams in to beat the defensive prod and strikes him on the thigh pad. This is good stuff from Maharoof. Imran looks a touch tentative
goes back to a length delivery that cut back in and pushed it away to the on side
fuller, on the middle, Imran gets behind the line to defend
outswinger that moves away late, Rahim pushes it to cover point

What a piece of great action. Malinga gets one to kick up from short of length, almost unplayable lifter around the off stump, Rahim is stunned into a poke, gets a thickish outside edge and Sangakkara flies to his right to take an acrobatic catch. Youtube moment.
well outside the off stump, left alone
back of length, kicks up, on the thigh pad, Ashraful tries to dab it away but doesn't make contact
lands on a length, around off and middle and it moves away from Ashraful who pushes at it with soft hands and it runs, along the ground,  between second and third slip.
lands outside off, on a length, and moves away, left alone
slipping on to the pads, dabbed away to Fernando at long leg
beaten. Climbs up from short of length, outside the off stump and Ashraful goes back and across, back leg ends up outside the off stump and he still has a poke at the delivery
this time he lets a length delivery outside off all alone
beaten. Again Ashraful shuffles right across the stumps, ends up outside off stump and pushes at a delivery moving further away
full and outside off, left alone. He didn't chase it this time.
full and outside off, swings away, left alone
another quick outswinger, left alone by the batsman but the ball climbs awkwardly at Sangakkara - above his left shoulder, and he doesn't gather it cleanly
leans forward, taps towards cover point for a single.
138.3 kph, full and slipping down the leg side, wide called
on the off stump, curving away late, pushes at it, gets a outside edge to thirdman
lands on a length, outside the off stump, swings away, left alone
ooh.... fuller, straighter, on the middle and it swings away, squaring up Ashraful in the process. But he manages to adjust and keeps it out
In the temptation zone outside off, left alone
lands outside the off stump, cuts in this time, still a tad away to interest Imran. The first ball left the bat, the next one came in. What next?
goes away. But it starts from outside off and Imran is not interested
and yes, this one slants in from outside off, Imran leans towards the line to dead-bat it away
well outside the off stump, goes on straight, left alone
short of length, outside the off stump, tapped to point
full and outside off, left alone.
leans forward to push a length delivery to extra cover
almost caught at cover. It was full and on the middle and off,  Tamim pushes at it it lazily, the bat-face opens out and the ball goes uppishly but safely to left of cover
short of length, goes back to defend
This one is fuller, Ashraful is struck at the crease and ends up nudging it away to the on side
full again, on the middle and off, straightens, Ashfraful defends
in the zone outside off, left alone
good length delivery defended on front foot on the track
another good length delivery on the off stump defended with full face off the bat on the track
bit fuller this time, blocked on the track
good leave this time from Imran...leaving it at the last moment
short in length outside the off stump, Imran lets it go through to Sangakkara
a thickish outside edge to thirdman, was looking to play to mid on
pitched up delivery driven well towards mid on
good ball from Fernando, angled into Tushar Imran, who blocks it back to the bowler
goes for the pull...gets it on the glove and they scamper through for a single
fuller delivery drives with an open face to cover
short in length delivery outside the off stump, gets right behind it and defends it to the off side
Maharoof strikes, good length delivery angled in...leaves a gap between bat and pad and the ball goes through and strikes the top of the off stump.
runs it down to thirdman with an open face off the bat
gets right  behind it and defends to the off side
lands on a length, outside off, slides in a touch, turned towards square leg for a single
full and just outside off, pushed to cover
on the middle, nudged to the on side.
starts off with a full delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful shoulders arms
offcutter on the off stump line, Ashraful thinks it will move away, tries to punch to cover, the ball slides in and he gets a inside edge
this one moves away off the saeam, outside the off stump, left alone
nice. Fuller, straighter, just outside off and moves away late, Ashraful pushes at it, edges it to third man
full and in the temptation zone, Aftab shapes to play but pulls out of a shot at the last minute. Wise decision.
back of length, climbs up around off stump, Aftab jabs at it and it runs down to third man
slower one, full, Aftab picks it up late, lunges forward to defend
hits the deck, back of length and it kicks up outside off stump even as it holds its line. Aftab is beaten, pushing inside the line
fuller, on the middle and leg, Aftab plays around it and is struck on the pad. Appeal for lbw but it was going down leg
almost an yorker, dug out to the off side

Dropped by Chamara Silva at gully. It leapt up from short of length, outside the off stump, Ashraful shuffled across, pushed at the delivery and it went off the outside edge low to the left of Silva who dived but couldn't hold on. Fernando is not amused. That would have been the big wicket of the day.
goes back and across to push a short-of-length delivery to point
slings a fullish delivery outside off, which angles away from Aftab who withdraws his bat from the line
fuller, straighter, on the off, Aftab is a touch late in getting his bat forward to defend and the ball runs off the edge to thirdman
fuller, on the legs, Ashraful stays back to wrist it away to long leg
short of length, outside the off stump, holds its line, Aftab plays at it with soft hands and gets an outside edge but it rolls along the ground towards slip
full and outside leg, tickled away to long leg
back of length, just outside the off stump, Ashraful goes back and across, stands up tall to get on top of the bounce and pushes it towards point
full-pitched, outside the off stump, driven to mid off
Hello? Aftab has a charge and a miss. Mad adrenalin rush. Fernando saw him jumping out and dragged back the length and the ball bounced over the blade.
on the off stump line, pushed back down the track
Fuller, outside the off stump and Aftab leans towards the line to knife it over mid off. Clean strike. The next ball should be interesting.
Fernando keeps it full again, Aftab taps it to covers and walks to wards square leg.
in the corridor outside off stump, holding its line, Aftab hops across, covers the off stump before shouldering arms
on the middle line, Ashraful leans forward to defend
full and outside the leg stump, Ashraful doesn't connect his sweep shot and a wide is called
full, on the middle, hit across the line to midwicket
again well outside leg stump, Sanga is unable to gather it and apologises to the bowler.
on the legs, turned past square leg for a single
again on the legs, flicked behind square for another single
on the legs again, strikes him on the pad
slower one, sent down with spilt-fingered grip, full and on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
again that split-fingered grip but this time he bounces it short, and Ashraful goes back, waits before working it towards midwicket
fuller, on the middle, trying to trap him lbw, driven to mid on
attempted yorker ends up as a low full toss, pushed to mid off
full-pitched, on the middle, worked through midwicket
here comes a bouncer, ducked under
lovely delivery. It drifted in around leg and middle, landed and turned, Ashraful was looking to play it to the on side and gets a outside edge to the off side
on the middle, driven with the turn to cover point
slips down the leg side, nudged to short fine leg
appeal for lbw as a slider beats the defensive prod to strike Aftab on the leg stump line.
Another appeal. It landed on a length, straightened after pitching the off stump, Aftab tries to cut and is hit on the pad. But just outside off and he survives.
yet another appeal. Floated across full and Aftab goes for a sweep, misses and they go up in appeal. It must have pitched just outside leg stump.
full and straight, Ashraful is caught at the crease, pushes at it and gets a inside edge to the on side
slower one, full and outside the off stump, driven through widish mid off
on the off stump line, coming in off the seam a touch, Aftab leans forward to defend.
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket for a single
short of length, outside off, Ashraful goes back and across, opens the bat-face and runs it to thirdman
bangs it in short, a well-directed bouncer, Aftab ducks
tossed up, around off, driven to cover
slow through the air, spins from off, punched to cover point
full and on the off stump line, turning away, Aftab leans forward, drives with the turn to left of cover
on the middle and leg, full, driven to long on
again on the middle and leg, full, Aftab takes out the front leg from the line, drives with a bit of inside edge to wide midwicket
shifts his line to outside off and driven to sweeper cover

from round the stumps, drifting in on the middle, worked to the on side for a quick single. Mahela swwops in from square leg to have a direct hit at the non-striker's end. No danger to the batsman though. Rudi refers to third umpire neverthless and verdict is not out
goes back to whip a delivery on the off and middle past square leg
slow through the air, full and on the middle, driven to long off for a single
on the off and middle, sliding in, defended on the front foot
Hmm.... a reverse sweep. Full and just outside off stump, Aftab reverse sweeps it fine

on the off stump line, pushed to cover point and Ashraful wants a single, Aftab doesn't and Ash doesn't look too happy when he sees the point fielder has failed to stop the ball and they run a single.
flighted up, on the middle and leg, driven to long off
on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
full and on the middle, wristed through midwicket
tossed-up, on the middle and leg, driven to mid on
lands on the middle, turns towards off, defended on the front foot
on the middle and leg, turned to backward square leg
on the off stump, flighted delivery, pushed to off side

almost a mix-up. Ashraful leans forward to defend to the off side, towards cover point and takes a step forward. Aftab responds and rushes across but Ashraful stays where he is. Sanga moves quickly and fires in a throw at non-striker's end, Jayasuriya doesn't get behind the stumps, just stretches his left hand out and messes up. Had he gathered cleanly it would have been interesting
leans forward to defend a delivery on the middle
punched through cover point for a single
on the leg and middle, swept away for a single
leans forward to defend a delivery on the leg and middle
flighted delivery on the middle and leg, driven to mid on where Malinga doesn't stop cleanly
bit of air, outside off, fullish, Ash goes for a square drive, well away from the body and it goes in the air past the diving backward point fielder
driven to long off for a single
slow through the air, on the off stump line, driven to long off again
flatter, on the middle and leg, wristed past square leg
on the leg stump line, attempts a  sweep shot doesn't connect though
driven to long off for a single
charges out, Jayasuriya slows up the pace and Aftab has to lunge forward and he has a swing across the line and it goes to right of mid on
slow through the air, outside off, Aftab tries to paddle it away and it strikes him on the hip, in front of off stump. Shout for lbw. Not given. V Very close.
driven through point for a single
on the middle and leg, is struck  on the pad while pushing forward to defend
bit more air, more loop and it dips outside off, Aftab leans forward to drive through cover point
fuller, on the middle and off, driven past the diving bowler to long off
on the middle, driven inside-out to long off
on the middle and leg, turned to right of mid on for a single
pushes it from front of the hand but loses control and it goes down the leg side
leans forward to push a delivery to cover point
on the middle and leg, swept to long leg

Ashraful is gone. It drifts in from outside the off stump, turns a touch, Ashraful tries to play a late cut and ends up guiding it in to Sangakkara's gloves. They appeal. Ashraful stands rooted and suddenly decides to walk as he sees Rudi about to get into action.
leans forward to defend
leans forward, drives to left of Jayasuriya who moves across to make the stop
turns in from outside off, defended on the back foot
on the middle, worked to widish mid on
leans forward to drive to the bowler
leans forward, waits, guides to backward point
flighted well outside off stump, stretches across well to drill it through extra cover. Nice use of the feet and lovely balance.
stays back to defend a full delivery on the middle
lands outside off stump, turned with the turn to midwicket
on the middle and leg, turns, Aftab stays adjacent to the line, drives inside-out, with the turn, to extra cover
Full and on the middle, jabbed away to the on side
yorker length, outside the off stump, stabs at it and does not get a touch and Sanga gathers with oohs and aahs
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket region

Dropped  by Chamara Silva again. This was a dolly.  A lovely slower one- split-fingered grip, full and outside off, Aftab is sucked into a loose drive and it goes straight to extra cover where Silva drops it.
in the zone outside off, left alone
topspinner on the middle stump line, tries to play across the line, thinking it will turn in and gets a leading edge to the off side. Good delivery.
on the middle again, this time he spots the delivery and plays to the off side
comes down the track and almost yorks himself in the process, pushes it down the track
goes back to work to midwicket region for a single
drifts in towards middle and leg, turns, defended on the front foot
on the middle and off, driven to long off. Drinks break
Oh ho! Aftab has another charge and a miss. He came down the track, moving outside leg stump in the process and has a wild swish.
climbs up from a length, on the middle and leg, Aftab is surprised at the extra bounce and swats it away towards square leg
short of length, around the off stump, Shakib jabs it away to the off side.
full and outside off, punched to extra cover
full-pitched on the off stump line, punched to cover
bouncer on the leg stump line, ducked under
lands on the middle and off, turns, and Aftab goes for a reverse paddle, doesn't connect well
legbreak around the off stump, edged to short third man
fuller and on the leg and middle, Aftab brings up Bangladesh's 100 with a inside-out drive to long off
full and driven to long on for a single
flighted delivery outside off stump, driven to extra cover
quicker, just outside off stump, turns in, Shakib goes back to cut through backward point and Maharoof cleans up from sweeper cover
flighted delivery outside off, driven to long on
slow through the air, flighted above eye-level, outside off, driven through the off side for a single
leans forward to defend a delivery turning in from outside off
full and well outside off and Shakib stretches across to drive to sweeper cover
charges out, Jayasuriya slows up the pace even as he follows Aftab who had backed outside leg, jabbed away to wide mid on
on the middle and leg, turned past square leg for a single. Interesting over. The batsmen were looking to attack and Jayasuriya kept changing his line, length and the pace.
turns from outside off stump, goes back to work it to fine leg
slips down the leg side, Wide called
comes down but tentative steps and he just pushes a loopy delivery back to the bowler . Bandara is bowling well here.
And he reaps the reward. Flighted full and just outside off, Shakib goes for a sweep shot and plays all over it as the ball turns in to peg back the stump. Another one down. 111 for 6
beaten. Slightly short of length, slightly quicker, outside off and turning away, he tries to cut and is beaten
leans forward to drive to long off
on the off stump line, driven to long off
flighted on the off and middle, driven to cover
beaten. Slow through the air, lands on a length on the off stump and broke away, Reza pushes at it inside the line and is beaten by the turn
beaten again. Just like the first ball he faced today, he goes for a cut and misses.
leans forward to push a length delivery back to the bowler
and again
huge shout for lbw. Flighted delivery on the middle, Aftab plays a nothing shot across the line and is struck in front of middle and leg. Very close shout. Umpire felt it would have turned down leg.
flicked past square leg for as ingle
outside off, cut to backward point for a single

117 for 7 now. A run out. on the middle, flighted  delivery, leans forward to work it past square leg. They rush across for a single, turn for the second but Jayasuriya fires in a accurate throw at Dilshan who grabs at it and the ball slips out of his hands and hits the sticks. The bails are off. It is out.
on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
on the off stump line, driven to long off
leans forward to drive to long off
slips down the leg side, Aftab fails to connect his flick and Sangakkara gathers down the leg side
on the middle and leg, mistimes a sweep to short fine leg
flatter, quicker, punched to cover

Wicket no 298 for Jaysuriya. Floated short of length, on the middle and off, Aftab shapes to pull and ends up swatting it lamely to midwicket. Soft dismissal. Bangladesh teetering on the precipice here.
land on a length around off stump, pushed to the off side
lands full outside off, spins away and he is beaten inside the line
from round the stumps, really slow in the air, tossed up, on the middle and leg, driven through the on side
quicker, flatter, on the middle and off, almost trapped in front as he was mightly late in getting his bat forward to keep it out
gets this one to long on for a single
outside off stump, pushed to cover point for a single
on the middle and leg, Shahadat stays back to work it past square leg
full and on the middle, defended on the front foot, back down the track
similar delivery, same result
full, on the middle and leg, Shahadat stays back, works it to square leg
beaten. It lands outside off stump and spins in, past the defensive blade, and pops up off the thigh pad to Sangakkara
tossed-up, full and outside off, Razzak tries to heave it away to the on side, gets a inside edge to the boot
full and just outside off, driven to mid off
bangs this one short, outside off, Shahadat is late on the pull shot and the ball flies to Sangakkara
Ouch. Nasty lifter at the body, Shahadat is caught in a tangle, eyes off the ball, and the ball crashes in to the gloves and rams in to the helmet grill. Hmm.... What next?
Another lifter. 130 k this time, the previous one was much slower, and Shahadat fends it off ungainly as the ball thuds in to his right forearm
another short-pitched stuff, below-chest high this time, and Shahadat somehow manages to swat it away to the on side
full and slanting across the batsman who lets it go past him. That was a furious over from Malinga.
teasing flight, just outside off and Shahadat drives uppishly past a diving Jayasuriya to mid off region

Wicket no 299 for Jayasuriya. Tossed-up really full, outside off stump, Razzak took his front leg from the line and wanted to swing it to the on side but it was too full to go across and he sent it straight to long off.
almost got his 300th. Fired in real quick and full, just outside off and Rasel had no clue, had a stab and a miss.

full and outside off, squeezed to third man region. The Malinga throw came to Sangakkara who swivelled to fire in a throw at Jayasuriya, who again is not behind the stumps and he lunges to stop the ball and tries to back flick to the stumps. But the ball slips out of his hands and he breaks the sticks with his arm
beaten. Spins with a bit of bounce from outside off, Rasel goes for a cut and misses
What a lovely slower one. It looped in full and just missed the off stump. Shahadat was beaten comprehensively
almost a yorker, on the middle and leg, stabbed away to the off side
banged in short and it sails harmlessly down the leg side
another loopy slower one, full toss, Shahadat backs away and just about manages to put bat to the ball and it rolls through midwicket
Furious yorker at the leg stump line, Rasel digs it out.
slides on to the pad, runs off the pad. One ball to go. Will Jayasuriya get a chance to go for his 300 or will MAlinga finish it off here?
he seems to have taken a fancy to Shahadat. Another short-pitched stuff, at the body, Shahadat backs away a touch, takes the bottom-hand off the handle, and jabs it away to the on side
full and outside off, slides in, pushed to cover
slow in the air, spins in from outside off, worked through midwicket. Four balls left for Jayasuriya to have go at that 300th wicket

Mahela drops that 300th wicket floated in on the off stump line, and it holds up a touch on Shahadat who ends up driving early and it goes to right of Mahela at silly mid off  who ends up palming it away. Jayasuriya almost caught the rebound

lands outside off stump, Rasel goes for a sweep and is struck on the pad, outside the off stump. While Sangakkara goes to retrieve the ball, Jayasuriya lets out a huge cry for lbw. Rudi is unmoved. Jayasuriya wants that 300th wicket today.

That's his 300th wicket! Jayasuriya has done it. He tossed it up outside off, Rasel went for a lofted drive but could not clear mid off. Jayasuriya is chuffed.  He gets the ball from the umpire and walks off with it. The crowd are on their feet to applaud him. Trevor Penny and other Sri Lankan players in the balcony, also join in the applause. Congrats Jayasuriya.

inn2.comm: good start. Some swing right away. It swung away from Tharanga who let it go past him.
slightly short of length, outside off, punched through  cover
Oh ho! no time wasted. He is off and running. Short of length, outside the off stump and he cuts it past the diving point.
on a length, around the off stump and Jayasuriya goes back to defend
comes in with the angle from just outside off, Jayasuriya goes back to defend it down the track
shapes in from outside off stump, Jayasuriya is again back, wants to punch it away to the off side and gets a inside-edge to the pad
short of length, lands on the leg and middle, straightens a touch, Tharanga tucks it behind square for a single
fuller, on the legs, swinging in a touch, Jayasuriya flicks it away to long leg
hits the deck short, it rises up above-waist high at the body on the middle and leg, clipped away to fine leg
short of length and slanting away from Jayasuriya who hops up to get on top of the bounce and short-arm jabs it past point. Typical Jayasuriya shot.
oh nice. Fuller and just outside off, Jayasuriya was hanging on the back foot and gets his bat in front at the last minute and gets a inside edge to square leg. Beaten by the fuller length.
And now comes the bouncer but it goes down the leg side. Wide called.
on a length, around the middle line, straightens, Jayasuriya jabs it away to the on side
Cracking on the up stroke. Short of length, just outside off stump, Tharanga didn't move his feet, just shifted his weight on to the back foot and knifed it on the up through extra cover
As I told you Rahim was up near the stumps and couldn't gather this one that slipped down the leg side.
full and on the leg and middle - he is trying to correct his length after that four - and flicked away past square leg
short of length, outside off stump, Tharanga tries to cut but gets under edge on to the off side
on a length, curving away from Tharanga who pushes it out in the V
short of length, outside off, Tharanga wants to repeat his stroke that he pulled off in the first ball but gets a edge to the on side.
He gets it right this time. Again a touch short and outside off stump and he punches it through cover point
almost holed up to long leg. Short of length, on the middle and leg, Jayasuriya pulls it in the air but drops short of Rasel who rushed in.
beaten. In the corridor of uncertainity and Tharanga had a tentative poke and a miss.
lands on the leg stump line, on a length, moves towards middle, Tharanga gets behind the line to dab it the on side. Shahadat rushes across to make the stop.
on a length, on the leg and middle and it straightens which cramps up Tharanga who quickly gets his front pad out of the way to dab it to square leg.
short of length, just outside off stump, Tharanga goes back and across to defend
short of length, on the middle and off, Tharanga pushes it out to the off side
full and outside the off stump, defended on the front foot
fuller, on the middle and off, Jayasuriya is a touch late in coming forward but eventually, turns it to the on side
lands outside off, on a length, moves away off the seam, left alone
full and on the leg and middle. worked to the on side
nice probing line continues. Just outside off, moving away, left alone
fuller and outside off, pushed to cover. Tight over comes to an end.
banged in short, on the leg and middle line, ducked under
gift-wraps a boundary with a short and wide delivery. Tharanga eases it to the point boundary
And again. This is a better stroke. It was fuller and outside off and he just bent his front knee a touch and square drove it through point.
The best of the three. Slightly short of length, just outside off, Tharanga goes on the back foot and punches it on the up through cover. Fab stroke.

The best delivery of this over. It was short in length, on the middle and leg and cut back in, Shahadat was cramped as he still tries to punch it on the up to the off side but the line was not perfect for it. He gets rapped on the thigh pad
climbs up from short length, on the middle and leg, tapped to the on side. They think about a run and both retreat
fuller, going down the leg side and he tries to flick it away, misses and is struck on the pad
short of length and outside off - he has already sent three of those deliveries to the boundary- punched to cover
fuller, just around the off stump and Tharanga lofts it over mid on.
on a length, comes in from just outside off, defended on the back foot. Jayasuriya has allowed Tharanga to occupy centrestage

almost cleaned up. Full in length, just outside the off stump and it cuts back in, Jayasuriya goes for a loose on-the-up drive and the ball threads the bat and pad gap to go past the off stump. He was bowled in the first game with a delivery that came back in like this.
full in length, around the off stump, Tharanga opens the bat-face to guide it to point
Gone! Shahadat gets his revenge. It hit the deck short of length and climbed above waist-high as it slanted across Tharanga who was squared-up a touch and had a fatal poke.
fuller and on the middle, Sangakkara eases it to mid on
on the off stump line, Sangakkara goes back and across to keep it away
full and in the zone  outside off, left alone . It has been a very good over so far
And he finishes it off with another good one. It landed on a length, on the leg stump and moved in towards middle, Sangakkara tried to jab it away to the on side but is struck on the thigh pad
outswinger just outside off stump and Jayasuriya shoulders arms
this one comes in with the arm, Jayasuriya gets behind the line to defend.
cuts back in from a length from outside the off stump, Jayasuriya jabs at it tentatively and gets a inside edge to square leg
he breaks free with a lofted drive. Fuller, on the off stump line and Jayasuriya leapt at fuller and lofted it over mid off
Higher, bigger, farther this time. Again Rasel serves one full, on the stumps, and Jayasuriya smokes it to the long-on region. Just one bounce over the ropes
bounces at Jayasuriya who is surprised and fends it off awkwardly to the on side.
Short of length, slanting across Sangakkara who stood tall to punch it through point. Top shot.
this one bounces a bit more, just outside off, defended on the back foot
around the off stump, on a length, Sangakkara jabs at it and gets a inside-edge to short fine leg
banged in short, at the ribs and Jayasuriya swivels off the front foot to pull it to right of long leg
'catch it!' was the cry from Shahadat as Sangakkara square drove at a fullish delivery outside off stump. It flew off the edge and past the diving gully fielder.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
cuts in from the off stump, stabbed away to the on side
short in length, outside the off stump, Sangakkara goes back and across to punch it back to the bowler who makes a half-stop

Huge appeal and given out caught behind. Sangakkara doesn't look too happy. It was full in length and well outside the off stump, Sangakkara chased it, trying to force it through the off side. He must have got a thin nick and Rahim took the catch. They went up in appeal. Rudi  Koertzen waited. Sangakkara was not going anywhere. Then, the fatal finger came up ever so slowly. Sangakkara was surprised, shaked his head as he went away. The snickometer fails to show any edge. Anyway, that's that.
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the off stump line
slants away from Mahela who steers it to thirdman
on the off stump line, guided to point
short and outside off stump, cut to point
fuller, on the off stump line, tapped to the off side. Mahela practices the defensive stroke again. Sri Lanka sitting pretty at 59 for 2.
fullish, outside the off stump, left alone by Mahela
full and around the off stump line, driven to cover
banged in short, on the middle and off, pulled past square leg. He rolled the wrists well to ensure that the ball went to the ground
another short one from Shahadat, Jayasuriya gets on to his toes, on top of the bounce and he pushes to the off side
on the middle and leg, moving towards middle, defended down the track.
probing delivery. It landed on a length, on the off stump and straightened towards off. Mahela is cramped up but adjusts to jab it away to the off side
beaten. This one is taken away. Off cutter that landed on middle and moves past the outside edge of Mahela who was unsure about its destination. Rasel is bowling very well here.
on the middle, defended to the on side. No ball though.
beaten again. Another off cutter and this time Mahela picked it but wanted to guide it through to third man and is beaten. Rasel has been warned for running on to the danger area

Drama. Huge appeal from Rahim for another caught behind decision. Another off cutter around the off stump and Mahela pushes at it, it appears to have ran off the face of the bat and it pops out of Rahim' gloves but he adjusts to dive to grab it on third attempt. Rudi Koertzen is unmoved. Mahela stays.
short of length, outside off, Mahela goes for a cut, gets a bottom edge on to the ground and to the 'keeper
short of length, on the hips, turned past square leg
Now it's Jayasuriya's turn to get a single with a nudge to square leg
on the hips, glanced behind square leg for a single
short and just outside leg stump, pulled away to fine leg boundary
back of a length outside leg stump, tucked down to fine leg for one
he oversteps, pitching well outside off stump and its left alone
good length outside off stump, pushed to Ferhad at point
back of a length, pushed to Shakib at cover
a touch fuller, stops on him as he tries to turn it to leg
good length, pitching on middle and leg and coming in, Jayawardene gets right behind the line and defends it back to Rasel
good length, pushed across Jayawardene, who comes onto the front foot and defends to point
good length on middle and off, defended back as he crosses to off stump
turns in from outside off, dabbed to point. Slip in place.
outside the off stump, short as well, cut but can't beat the backward point fielder. An opportunity missed.

And he is gone now. Similar delivery - short of length and outside off stump - Jayasuriya goes for another cut but does not keep it down and it goes straight to Aftab at backward point. Soft dismissal.
quickish, drifting down leg side, tries to glance, misses but it runs off the pad to the boundary. Poor delivery first-up to a new batsman
And again. Criminal. But this time Rahim moves in time to gather.
slightly short, outside off, cut to point
teasing flight and turn. Looped up on the off stump and Chamara Silva goes for a flamboyant square drive and is beaten by the dip and the turn
lands on the leg stump line, slants across Jayawardene who turns it to midwicket

Dropped Short of length and angling across Jayawardene who tries to punch it away through the off side, gets a edge and it runs off Rahim's gloves and to the left of slip where Nafees dives full stretch but can't get his palm under it
But he is gone now. Fab catch. Short of length and Mahela mistimes a pull to right of midwicket where Aftab takes a step before flinging himself in the air to take it.
short of length, on the middle , curves in a touch, nudged to square leg
full and on the off stump line, Dilshan leans forward, opens the bat-face to steer to short third man
full and angling away, left alone
floated in on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
turns away from outside off, cut to backward point for a single.
fuller, straighter, on the middle, trying to trap him in front, Dilshan pushes it out to cover
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
beaten. Full and just outside off, Dilshan goes for a cut - not the length for it - and is beaten
on the middle, fullish, driven to mid on . Good tight over.
on a length, on the middle, worked to square leg
on the middle line, pushed back to the bowler
pushed across Dilshan who watches Rahim gather the ball .

almost carried to slip. It was short in length, angling away from Dilshan who tries to force it off the back foot but is in trouble by the extra bounce. The outside edge flew low and to left of first slip but just falls short
on the middle line, dabbed to the on side
sharp turn there. Ripped outside off stump and it broke away. Chamara left it alone
not so much tweak at release this time and the ball floats in on the off stump, defended on the front foot
flighted delivery on the off stump line, again defended on the front foot
fires in that quick and straight on the middle, Chamara was ready though and defended to the on side
on the middle and leg, worked to square leg
bit more air, slow through the air, fullish, on the middle, driven back to the bowler
way outside the off stump. Rudi extends his arms.
streaky edge between slip and the 'keeper. Full and outside off, Chamara Silva frees his arms and gets a edge.
Crack. Short of length and outside off - just the delivery a batsman wants, and slapped past point. Farhad Reza needs to tighten up
full and outside off, driven to sweeper cover
better. Homing in on the off stump, Dilshan leans forward to push it out to the cover region
length delivery buzzes through the zone outside off, left alone
and he will stay on naught as he leans forward to defend a length delivery on the middle and off
flighted on the middle and off, full, patted to the off side
There comes the charge. Silva waltzes down the track, reaches the pitch to loft it right over the bowler's head. Clean strike.
he comes down the track again, doesn't reach the pitch this time and mistimes the intended lofted drive to the midwicket region
Dilshan is off the mark in his 17th delivery. Short of length, cut away to deep point
again a touch short, Chamara cuts uppishly past the diving point fielder
fullish, on the off stump line, Dilshan is cautiously forward and defends to the off side
short of length, outside the off stump, Dilshan stands up tall to punch it away but gets a thickish edge down to wide third man. He wanted to force it through backward point
length delivery homing in on the off stump, Chamara shapes to square drive on the up and sends it towards point
Shot, just a single though. It was full and outside off, Chamara went back and across to slam a powerful square drive but straight to deep point.
Dilshan gets the cut shot right this time. Short of length and outside off, he went back and across to spank it through backward point.
oh ho. Too short a bouncer and it went way too high.
from wide of the crease, angling in to the pad, tucked behind square leg for a single
short of length, outside off stump, Dilshan is beaten on the cut shot
leans forward to push to cover
hmm,, he first tries to run down the track, Razzak fires it in on the middle and Dilshan tries to back away to the leg side! But realises the ball is too fast and he jabs it away
short of length, outsisde off, cut to deep point
slower in the air, bit more air, on the off and middle, tapped to the off side
short of length, just outside off, cut to point
slower one, well outside off stump, Dilshan got into a position to play a forcing stroke through the off side but decides against it.
banged in short but too wide outside off stump. Shahadat is not able to get his bouncers working in this spell. One flew too high in the last over and this one sails way outside off
slower off cutter, just outside off, pushed to backward point
full and outside off, Dilshan has a flash and a miss.
And again. Another drive and a miss. He is going too hard at it. Shahadat gives him an icy stare.
fuller, closer to the off stump, driven to mid off.
charges out and swings the ball on the legs to deep square leg region
leans forward to defend a delivery on the middle stump line
slow in the air, on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
lands on the leg stump line, turns in, flicked to square leg
too short and width outside off but Chamara picks the man at deep point with his cut shot.
turns away from the off stump, left alone
short and outside off but for some reason Chamara Silva decides to fetch it from there and goes for a pull shot, ending up swatting it to mid on
fuller, just outside off, Silva is on the front foot to drive to mid on
fullish, homing in on the off stump, Chamara Silva is a touch early in to the drive and checks his shot and it rolls over towards mid on
lands on a length, outside off stump, slides in a touch, Silva moves towards the line to push it to cover point
full and outside off, left alone
on a driveable length, outside off stump and Silva eases it to right of sweeper cover.
full and just outside off, pushed to cover point
full and turning away from the off stump, Dilshan chooses to go for a cut shot and ends up dabbing it to backward point
tossed up, outside off, fullish, driven past the bowler for a single
Flighted on the off and middle line, full and Silva goes down on his knee to slog-sweep it over midwicket. 18 more to win.
full and slipping down the leg side.
on the off stump line, turning away, nudged towards cover. He had wanted to cut it but again the length was not right. Both these batsmen favour the cut shot and some times, choose the wrong length
full again and this time he is on the front foot to square drive through backward point
fullish, outside off stump, square driven through backward point
short of length, outside off stump, cut away to deep point
leans forward to drive to cover. 14 more to win.
lands on a length, around the off stump, slides in a touch, defended on the front foot. Good stride forward.
full in length, on the middle, Silva has a swing across the line and is struck in front of leg and middle. Appeal for lbw but Rudi reckons it would be going down leg side
on the off stump line, steered to backward point
Another Dilshan cut. Slightly short and he jumps back to slap it past backward point
comes down the track, drives back to Razzak who has a shy at the striker's end.
arm-ball, on the off stump, full in length but again Dilshan backs away, looking for that cut and he dabs it away to cover point
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
full and on the leg and middle line, Silva sweeps it wide of long leg fielder. 5 more to win.
tossed-up, inviting him to go for it and Silva sweeps it from the middle to long leg. Four more runs. One shot away from victory.
full and outside off stump, Silva goes for another sweep shot but misses and gets a leg bye
pushed to cover.
lands on the off and middle, turns away, cut to deep point
spinning towards off stump, Chamara goes back to push it to cover

Chamara falls going for the winning shot. It was tossed up, slightly short in length and Chamara went down on the front knee and went for a pull shot but couldn't keep it down. Caught at deep midwicket. Ashraful looks very pleased with the wicket. He pumps his fist and screams in delight.
lands on the leg stump and spins down leg side. wide. The scores are level.
flighted delivery on the off stump line, wristed to midwicket

And Dilshan gets it with his favourite cut shot. Short and outside off, he spanks it past point. Mahela and Trevor Penny applaud in the pavilion. Hand shakes in the middle. Another series has been won by the Sri Lankans.
